'''Red Metal Key''' is a [[Quest Item]] found in the [[Sulfurous Veins]]. It can be picked up while exploring an ancient ruin section during [[Beneath the Crystal Rock]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The key can be used to unlock a door-opening lever in the [[Sulfurous Veins]], allowing access to two Common and one Precious Chests.
